verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had dried <S%H3001>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we were passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> that their <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melted,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> there <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in them any <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

At <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H6213>Make<s%> thee <S%H6864>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>knives,<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H6864>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>knives,<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of the <S%H6190>foreskins.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>cause<s%> <S%H834>why<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> did <S%H4135>circumcise:<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> that were <S%H2145>males,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> after they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

Now <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised:<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H3209>born<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> as they came <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> them they had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>people<s%> that were <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> which came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> were <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> unto <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> that he would <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%> that he would <S%H5414>give<s%> us, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

And their <S%H1121>children,<s%> whom he raised <S%H6965>up<s%> in their <S%H8478>stead,<s%> them <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> them by the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> they had <S%H8552>done<s%> <S%H4135>circumcising<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>people,<s%> that they <S%H3427>abode<s%> in their <S%H8478>places<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> they were <S%H2421>whole.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> This <S%H3117>day<s%> have I rolled <S%H1556>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you. Wherefore the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H6213>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And they did <S%H398>eat<s%> of the old <S%H4480>corn<s%> <S%H5669><s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> on the morrow <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H4283><s%> the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>cakes,<s%> and <S%H7033>parched<s%> corn in the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow<s%> <S%H4283><s%> after they had <S%H398>eaten<s%> of the old <S%H4480>corn<s%> <S%H5669><s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> any <S%H5750>more;<s%> but they did <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H8393><s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> by <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> that he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H5975>stood<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> over <S%H5048>against<s%> him with his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H8025>drawn<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> unto <S%H413>him,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Art <S%H859>thou<s%> for us, <S%H518>or<s%> for our <S%H6862>adversaries?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>Nay;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> as <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H935>come.<s%> And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and did <S%H7812>worship,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H1696>saith<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5650>servant?<s%>

And the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6635>host<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H5394>Loose<s%> thy <S%H5275>shoe<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy <S%H7272>foot;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5975>standest<s%> is <S%H6944>holy.<s%> And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>
